0.9.name: wordpress/so-audible
0.9.description:
So Audible Cloud Music Player, sync your tracks share with friends upload, quick share embed, html5, ipad, iphone, android, play music anywhere long mixes, meetings, sermons, podcasts, radio.

You will need an soaudbile account to use this, sign up here. http://soaudible.com/

If you would like to put this feed within your template please use the following code

<?php $soaudible->soaudible_player(array('autoplay' => 'false',
        'album' => 'enter-your-album',)); ?>

If you would like to put this feed within a post or page use the following code.

[soaudible autoplay="true" album="enter-your-album"]

Or simple use the widget
